author: wired blogs
text: date: wed 10/20/1999 8:13 am from: roger d swanson (swanson2000@hotmail.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: snailmaili resent your use of the term snailmail in reference to the postal service at the bottom of your response page. (contact us). i believe i speak for the 850,000 hard working employees that bring you all those nice envelopes with the storm windows, etc. normally, i change radio stations and remove the setting from the push buttons when i hear an ad give a snailmail address and i
